channel.title: Comments on: Not Another Bitcoin Podcast #2: Crypto Maak

item.title: By: Kenn Bosak
item.dc:creator: Kenn Bosak
item.description: As far as I know, he was using the sites lending bot directly.
item.content:encoded: As far as I know, he was using the sites lending bot directly.

item.title: By: Mystacrypto
item.dc:creator: Mystacrypto
item.description: Great show! was curious if Crypto Maak's Poloniex lending was directly through their site using this bot (https://www.poloniexlendingbot.com/), or something else?
item.content:encoded: Great show! was curious if Crypto Maak’s Poloniex lending was directly through their site using this bot (https://www.poloniexlendingbot.com/), or something else?
